content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TXPARMCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 8
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.232
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: TXPARMCD Short character value for the Trial Set parameter described
  in TXPARM.  Maximum 8 characters.
Outcome:
  Message: TXPARMCD value has more than 8 characters
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '232'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TXPARMCD Short character value for the Trial Set parameter
                  described in TXPARM.  Maximum 8 characters.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TX

json.Description: TXPARMCD Short character value for the Trial Set parameter described in TXPARM.  Maximum 8 characters.

Outcome.Message: TXPARMCD value has more than 8 characters

Citations.Cited_Guidance: TXPARMCD Short character value for the Trial Set parameter described in TXPARM.  Maximum 8 characters.
